Html:
This is a great tool.  I'm able to generate a everything in my spreadsheet until I get to a field that has more than 255 chars of text.  Then the spreadsheet blows up when I try to open in Excel.  Any ideas?  The line of code looks like this:

$objPHPExcel->getActiveSheet()->setCellValue('AK' . $count, "Really really really long text here (more than 255 chars)");

Which writer are you using? PHPExcel_Writer_Excel2007 or PHPExcel_Writer_Excel5 ? Can you send me the broken Excel file so I can inspect? If possible, also the code you are using to generate it. (erik at phpexcel dot net)

Thanks, I received the file. This is likely related to bug fixed here:
http://www.codeplex.com/PHPExcel/WorkItem/View.aspx?WorkItemId=8320

Please try with latest source and report back.
Ok... I've tried with the latest source build.  Different results, but still an error.  This time, it will open completely in Excel, but it's just a bunch of binary stuff on the sheet.

This was after all not related to "Long Text Fields". Cause was identified as this:
http://www.codeplex.com/PHPExcel/WorkItem/View.aspx?WorkItemId=8810
